content: h new file enters the directory **Steps**: Retrieve `FuelSummaryFile` files #### - Data Handling Operation * `udorLocal` and `flightId` are retrieved from the RiverX Flight Leg Data Model using the values mapped according to the following conditions(see Mapping for details); * `udor` = Flight Leg Data Model `udor` * `carrier` = Flight Leg Data Model `carrier` * `flightNumber` = Flight Leg Data Model `flightNumber` * `suffix` = Flight Leg Data Model `suffix` * `departureAirport` = Flight Leg Data Model `departureAirport` * `arrivalAirport` = Flight Leg Data Model `arrivalAirport` * `regId` = Flight Leg Data Model `acRegNo` * Flight Leg Data Model `statusCode` <> “CNL“ and “DEL“ * When there are multiple records corresponding to these conditions, any one of those records is selected. #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: `flightId` * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed, as the source system does not delete Fuel Summary records. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source File|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |flightId| | |Data Handling Operation| |udor|`FuelSummaryFile`|`<IATA_AIDX_FuelNotifRQ>.<FuelFlightLeg>.<LegIdentifier>.<OriginDate>###</OriginDate>`| | |udorLocal| | |Data Handling Operation| |carrier|`FuelSummaryFile`|`<IATA_AIDX_FuelNotifRQ>.<FuelFlightLeg>.<LegIdentifier>.<Airline...>###</Airline>`| | |flightNumber|`FuelSummaryFile`|`<IATA_AIDX_FuelNotifRQ>.<FuelFlightLeg>.<LegIdentifier>.<FlightNumber>###</FlightNumber>`| | |suffix|`FuelSummaryFile`|`<IATA_AIDX_FuelNotifRQ>.<FuelFlightLeg>.<LegIdentifier>.<OperationalSuffix>###</OperationalSuffix>`| | |departureAirport|`FuelSummaryFile`|`<IATA_AIDX_FuelNotifRQ>.<FuelFlightLeg>.<LegIdentifier>.<DepartureAirport...>###</DepartureAirport>`| | |arrivalAirport|`FuelSummaryFile`|`<IATA_AIDX_FuelNotifRQ>.<FuelFlightLeg>.<LegIdentifier>.<ArrivalAirport...>###</ArrivalAirport>`| | |regId|`FuelSummaryFile`|`<IATA_AIDX_Fue
